item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, February 17, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Open Source projects could sell SBoM fragments (40 points | 19 comments)

23. San Francisco homelessness: Park ranger helps one person at a time (293 points | 427 comments)

26. “A calculator app? Anyone could make that” (1658 points | 403 comments)

29. Extreme supersonic winds measured on a planet outside our solar system (68 points | 42 comments)
